item.title: Build Your Own Mini Actor Framework: Run Concurrency Like a Coffee Shop
item.description: A hands-on guide to building a usable mini Actor framework in Rust from scratch: Actor, Addr, spawn, supervise, a simple registry, message passing, and HTTP interaction.
